organizationId.description: The UUID of the organization that owns this collection. Example: "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6".

type.description: The data model for this category: "concepts", "features", "content", or "table".

instructions.description: Extraction or indexing guidelines for items in this category (e.g. parsing rules, field mappings).

singleEntry.description: If true, this category will be indexed as a single entry.

categories.description: List of zero or more categories for sub-indexing. Leave as [] if you do not need additional facets.

name.description: A concise, human-readable name for the collection (≤50 chars; Title Case; no special symbols). Example: "Sales Reports Q2 2025".

pii.description: Indicates if this collection contains Personally Identifiable Information (PII).

piiControls.description: Array of PII control identifiers for this collection.

type.description: Classification of the collection. One of "frame" (ephemeral), "searchable-frame" (search-optimized), "canon" (default long-term), or "features" (embeddings store); defaults to "canon".

tags.description: Array of short keyword tags (single words, no spaces). Example: ["finance","Q2","internal"].

description.description: Multi-sentence description of purpose, contents, and intended usage (≤500 chars). Example: "Contains all client invoices from Jan–Mar 2025 for auditing."

instructions.description: High-level ingestion guidelines: outline data sources, preprocessing steps, and field mappings (e.g. "1. Convert PDFs to text…").

graphInstructions.description: Graph generation rules: define node types, edge semantics, and heuristics (e.g. "Link orders to customers by matching customer_id").

promptInstructions.description: LLM response guidelines: tone, format, and structure (e.g. "Use bullets, start with a one-sentence summary").

searchInstructions.description:
Bullet-point list of ≤5 search keys (one per line). Example:
- title
- author
- publication_date
